title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.5 - Timetable and deadlines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.5 - Timetable and deadlines

State Regulations
(a) Applicants shall submit five copies of the completed application by close of
business on the date established by the department and set forth in the Request
for Proposal. (b) Applications
should be hand-carried or sent by certified mail to assure a timely submittal. Applications postmarked later than the deadline established by the department
will not be considered. For technical assistance in the preparation or
submittal of grant applications or clarification of instructions, applicants
should contact the Job Service and Training District Office, Grants Management

Unit, or the New York State Dislocated Worker Unit in Albany. (c) Copies of the application package shall
be submitted to the Dislocated Worker Unit at the following address: New York

State Department of Labor, State Office Building Campus, Building #12, Room
162, Albany, NY 12240. (d) A copy
of the completed application should be sent to the appropriate Job Service and

Training District Office to the attention of the Grants Management Office. A
listing of such offices will be appended to the Request for Proposal. (e) A copy of the completed application
should also be sent to the Chairperson of the SDA Private Industry Council and
to the respective SDA Chief Elected Official(s). A listing of such individuals
will be appended to the Request for Proposal. Federal law requires a 30-day
period for review of applications by such individuals prior to program
operation. Appropriate forms acknowledging compliance with the review
requirement will be provided by the department and should accompany copies of
the program proposals submitted for review. Completed acknowledgment forms
should accompany the proposal when submitted to the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
920.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
